div.div: Eleanor McMain Secondary School, an InspireNOLA school, serves grades 9th - 12th in Uptown New Orleans.

5712 S. Claiborne Avenue,
New Orleans, LA 70125

div.p: This website is maintained by the InspireNOLA Charter Schools Communications Office. It is the goal of the network that this website is accessible to all users. View our accessibility statement here. The district is not responsible for facts or opinions contained on any linked site.
